title: A cyano cobalt “electron transfer bridge” boosting the two-electron reaction of a MnO2 cathode with long lifespan in aqueous zinc batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE03711H, Paper
Yaozhi Liu, Lu Lin, Tengsheng Zhang, Zhiqing Xue, Jie Liu, Dongliang Chao, Xiaoqi Sun
An electron transfer bridge based on Mn–NC–Co interactions is applied for a MnO2 cathode to boost its reversible two-electron reaction in conventional zinc cells.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
